LanguageData.Makesoymilk.label: make seven soy milks
LanguageData.Makesoycheese.label: make two cheese
LanguageData.Makesoycheese.description: Turn soy milk or milk into cheese.
LanguageData.Maketofu.label: make three tofus
LanguageData.Maketofu.description: Turn beans into tofu. Tofu is use in place of meat in meals or eatten raw. \n\nMakes 3 servings.
LanguageData.Makebulktofu.label: make bulk tofu
LanguageData.Makebulktofu.description: Your increased cooking skill allows you to mass produce tofu more efficiently! \n\nMakes 10 servings.
LanguageData.MakePolenta.label: make two polenta
LanguageData.MakePolenta.description: Turns cornmeal into polenta. Polenta can be eaten raw, cooked into other meals, baked, or grilled. \n\nMakes 2 servings.
LanguageData.MakebulkPolenta.label: Make bulk polenta
LanguageData.MakebulkPolenta.description: Turns cornmeal into polenta. Polenta can be eaten raw, cooked into other meals, baked, or grilled. \n\nMakes 10 servings.
LanguageData.HalfCoconut.label: split coconuts
LanguageData.HalfCoconut.description: Splits coconuts into two and harvests the milk from the fruit of one half. Leaving you with half a coconut and its milk. \n\nMakes 5 Halves and 5 Milks.
LanguageData.BrewCoffee.label: brew four coffees
LanguageData.BulkBrewCoffee.label: brew bulk coffee
LanguageData.BrewTea.label: brew two teas
LanguageData.BrewTea.description: Prepare tea leaves and brew them into cups of tea.
LanguageData.BulkBrewTea.label: brew bulk tea
LanguageData.BulkBrewTea.description: Prepare bulk amounts of tea leaves and brew them into cups of tea.
LanguageData.PickleVegetable.label: pickle ten low nutrition vegetables
LanguageData.PickleVegetable.description: Preserve ten lower nutrition vegetables in a salty brine to prevent spoiling.
LanguageData.PickleHighVegetable.label: pickle ten high nutrition vegetables
LanguageData.PickleHighVegetable.description: Preserve ten higher nutrition vegetables in a salty brine to prevent spoiling. Requires much less vegetables.
LanguageData.SaltMeat.label: salt ten meats
LanguageData.SaltMeat.description: Preserve meats in salt to prevent spoiling.
LanguageData.VG_VeganEgg.label: make Vegan Egg Substitute
LanguageData.VG_VeganEgg.description: Vegan Egg Substitute is a egg shape product made from tofu, pumpkin, or banana. Used in place of eggs in baking and other recipes.
